description: Provides a list of all data ingestion jobs, including dataset name and ARN, S3 location of the input data, status, and so on.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An opaque pagination token indicating where to continue the listing of data ingestion jobs.

nested_items.name: DataIngestionJobSummaries
nested_items.description: Specifies information about the specific data ingestion job, including dataset name and status.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: Indicates the job ID of the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: DatasetName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset used for the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: DatasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset used in the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: IngestionInputConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifies information for the input data for the data inference job, including data Amazon S3 location parameters.

nested_items.name: S3InputConfiguration
nested_items.description: The location information for the S3 bucket used for input data for the data ingestion.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket used for the input data for the data ingestion.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix for the S3 location being used for the input data for the data ingestion.

nested_items.name: KeyPattern
nested_items.description: The pattern for matching the Amazon S3 files that will be used for ingestion. If the schema was created previously without any KeyPattern, then the default KeyPattern {prefix}/{component_name}/* is used to download files from Amazon S3 according to the schema. This field is required when ingestion is being done for the first time.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the data ingestion job.
